item.description:
Jet supported by the Virgins. Tickets on sale 3/3/2007 for $20 each at http://www.livenation...

Door open at 7pm, show starts at 8pm.

For anyone interested in meeting up for a beer before the show, we'll be at Jillians (just down the street from Avalon) from 7pm onwards. Look for us on the second floor near the pool tables or bar. We'll move to Avalon just before 8pm to catch the start of the show.

Also a reminder to bring the correct ID. Avalon is usually very strict on ID, please bring your passport if you don't have a valid Mass. drivers license.

See you there

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Live Aussie music: Jet at Avalon
